definition: A marketplace where high-end and extravagant products are bought and sold, typically catering to individuals seeking luxury items.

examples.english: The luxury goods market is booming.
The luxury goods market offers exclusive products.
The luxury goods market is highly competitive.

examples.german: Der Luxusartikelmarkt richtet sich an wohlhabende Kunden.
examples.english: The luxury goods market caters to affluent customers.

examples.german: Der Luxusartikelmarkt verzeichnet jedes Jahr steigende Umsätze.
examples.english: The luxury goods market records increasing sales every year.
